title: Logging in to PBE
body: Riot can we please do something about the PBE time. I dont know how hard it would be or if it would help but maybe add a new server. Please just do something apart from making us wait hours to log in.

replies.body: A test server just isn't designed for these sort of numbers. There are many reasons they wouldn't open a second test server, chief among them at present being that this surge in activity is only temporary and will completely drop off once TFT is available on live servers.
